Scripts.OnLoad:
self.SetButton = Altoholic:GetClassExtension("AltoSortButtonsContainer","SetButton") self.ShowChildFrames = Altoholic:GetClassExtension("AltoFrame","ShowChildFrames") self.HideChildFrames = Altoholic:GetClassExtension("AltoFrame","HideChildFrames")
-- auto create the sort buttons, with the quantity passed as key for i = 1, self.numButtons do local frame = CreateFrame("Button", nil, self, "AltoSortButtonTemplate")
if i == 1 then frame:SetPoint("TOPLEFT") else -- attach to previous frame frame:SetPoint("LEFT", self["Sort"..(i-1)], "RIGHT", 0, 0) end
self["Sort"..i] = frame end
